---
category: news
title: "2 Reasons The AI Revolution Will Enhance Our Quality Of Life"
excerpt: "As capable as our brains are, there are many things AI can do better than a human. A 2023 study found that participants were unable to tell apart tweets written by GPT-3 and those by a human. We can focus on the little improvements generative AI like ChatGPT, Midjourney, and others are bringing."
